name: Hot Salmon Salad with Maille® Honey Dijon Mustard
author: Maille
summary: This simple arugula salad is tossed with a honey Dijon vinaigrette and poached salmon, green beans, and almonds. An elegant meal for lunch or dinner.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Maille® Honey Dijon Mustard, or more to taste
directions: Gently poach salmon in lightly salted water
At the same time, cook beans in lightly salted boiling water until just tender
Drain and reserve with salmon, keeping both warm
Lightly toast almonds in a dry non-stick pan and reserve
Peel skin from salmon, carefully flake flesh into large pieces and place in a bowl with arugula and cooked green beans
Mix dressing ingredients together and pour over salad
Transfer to serving bowls or plates
Top with toasted almonds and white pepper
